happiness.quotes: Laughter is the only cure for grief.
happiness.author: Robert Fulghum

happiness.quotes: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
happiness.author: Marcus Aurelius

happiness.quotes: Happiness is not something ready made it. It comes from your own actions.
happiness.author: Dalai Lama

happiness.quotes: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
happiness.author: Abraham Lincoln

happiness.quotes: Happiness depends opun ourselves.
happiness.author: Aristotle

happiness.quotes: Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace, and gratitude.
happiness.author: Denis Waitley

happiness.quotes: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
happiness.author: Mahatma Gandhi

happiness.quotes: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and the be loved.
happiness.author: George Sand

happiness.quotes: If you want to be happy, be.
happiness.author: Leo Tolstoy

happiness.quotes: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
happiness.author: Omar Khayyam

happiness.quotes: I am determined to be cheerful and happy in whatever situation.
happiness.author: Martha Washington

happiness.quotes: I have learned that the greater part of our misery or unhappiness is determined not by our circumstances but by our disposition.
happiness.author: Martha Washington

happiness.quotes: Joy is prayer; joy is strength; joy is love; joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls.
happiness.author: Mother Teresa

happiness.quotes: We are no longer happy, so soon as we wish to be happier.
happiness.author: Walter Savage Landor

happiness.quotes: Some cause happiness wherever they go, other whenever they go.
happiness.author: Oscar Wilde

happiness.quotes: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy that makes happiness.
happiness.author: Charles Spurgeon

happiness.quotes: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
happiness.author: Richard Bach

happiness.quotes: Happiness can exist only in acceptance.
happiness.author: George Orwell

happiness.quotes: I have the power to make me happy or unhappy. I just have one day, today, and I'm going to be happy in it.
happiness.author: Groucho Marx

happiness.quotes: Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more.
happiness.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

happiness.quotes: True happiness is to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
happiness.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

happiness.quotes: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
happiness.author: Sydney J. Harris

happiness.quotes: True happiness comes from the joy of deeds, well done, the zest of creating things new.
happiness.author: Antoine de Saint Exupery

happiness.quotes: Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action.
happiness.author: Benjamin Disraeli

happiness.quotes: Money can't buy you happiness, but it can buy you a yatch big enough to pull up right alongside it.
happiness.author: David Lee Roth

happiness.quotes: There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will.
happiness.author: Epictetus

happiness.quotes: Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance, order, rhythm and harmony.
happiness.author: Thomas Merton

happiness.quotes: All who joy would win must share it. Happiness was born a Twin.
happiness.author: Lord Byron

happiness.quotes: Now and then it's good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy.
happiness.author: Guillaurme Apollinaire

happiness.quotes: Money can't buy happiness, but it can make you awfully comfortable while you're being miserable.
happiness.author: Clare Boothe Luce

happiness.quotes: Happiness is an inside job.
happiness.author: William Arthur Ward

happiness.quotes: The art of being happy lies in the power of extracting happiness from common things.
happiness.author: Henry Ward Beecher

happiness.quotes: Happiness makes up in heights for what it lacks in length.
happiness.author: Robert Frost

happiness.quotes: The moment of happiness we enjoy take us by surprise. It is not that we seize them, but that they seize us.
happiness.author: Ashely Montagu

happiness.quotes: Happiness isn't something you experience, it's something you remember.
happiness.author: Oscar Levant

happiness.quotes: Happiness is the state of consciousness which proceeds from the achievement of the one's values.
happiness.author: Ayn Rand

happiness.quotes: The secret of happiness is to admire without desiring.
happiness.author: Carl Sandburg

happiness.quotes: Plenty of people miss their share of happiness, not because they never found it, but because they didn't stop to enjoy it.
happiness.author: William Feather

happiness.quotes: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
happiness.author: John Barrymore

happiness.quotes: To be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness.
happiness.author: Bertrand Russell

happiness.quotes: You know it's love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you're not part of their happiness.
happiness.author: Julia Roberts

happiness.quotes: Happiness never lays its finger on its pulse.
happiness.author: Adam Smith

happiness.quotes: Don't wait around for other people to be happy for you. Any happiness you get you've got to make yourself.
happiness.author: Alice Walker

happiness.quotes: Satisfaction of one's curiosity is one of the greatest sources of happiness in life.
happiness.author: Linus Pauling

happiness.quotes: Happiness is like a kiss. You must share it to enjoy it.
happiness.author: Bernard Meltzer

happiness.quotes: Be happy with what  you have and are, be generous with both, and you won't have to hunt for happiness.
happiness.author: William E. Gladstone

happiness.quotes: Happiness is  the absence of striving for happiness.
happiness.author: Zhuangzi

happiness.quotes: To make at least one person happy every day, it is a treasure in a lifetime.
happiness.author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

happiness.quotes: Research has shown that the best way to be happy is  to make each day happy.
happiness.author: Deepak Chopra

happiness.quotes: The most worth while thing is to try to put happiness into the lives of others.
happiness.author: Robert Baden Powell

happiness.quotes: We must fight in order to conquer happiness.
happiness.author: Alexandre Dumas

happiness.quotes: Happiness is dependent on self-discipline. We are the biggest obstacles to our own happiness.
happiness.author: Dennis Prager

happiness.quotes: Nothing brings me more happiness than trying to help the most vulnerable people in society.
happiness.author: Princess Diana

happiness.quotes: The first recipe for happiness is to avoid too lengthy meditation on  the past.
happiness.author: Andre Maurois

happiness.quotes: The secret of happiness is something to do.
happiness.author: John Burroughs

happiness.quotes: Love is trembling happiness.
happiness.author: Khalil Gilbran

happiness.quotes: Happiness in intelligent people is the rarest thing  I know.
happiness.author: Ernest Hemingway

happiness.quotes: True happiness consists not in the multitude of friends, but in the worth and choice.
happiness.author: Ben Jonson

happiness.quotes: Happiness is not a goal, it is a by-product.
happiness.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
